name: Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Lid and Straw for Water, Iced Tea or Coffee, Smoothie and More, Frost, 30oz
about_this_item: YOUR DREAM TUMBLER: Whichever way your day flows, the H2.0 FlowState tumbler keeps you refreshed with fewer refills. Double wall vacuum insulation means drinks stay cold, iced or hot for hours. Choose between our 14oz, 20oz, 30oz,40oz and 64oz options depending on your hydration needs. The narrow base on all sizes (except 64oz) fits just about any car cup holder, keeping it right by your side.

ADVANCED LID CONSTRUCTION: Whether you prefer small sips or maximum thirst quenching, Stanley has developed an advanced FlowState lid, featuring a rotating cover with three positions: a straw opening designed to resist splashes with a seal that holds the reusable straw in place, a drink opening, and a full-cover top for added leak resistance. We‚Äôve also included an ergonomic, comfort-grip handle, so you can easily carry your ice-cold water to work, meetings, the gym or trips out of town.

EARTH-FRIENDLY DURABILITY: Constructed of 90% recycled BPA free stainless steel for sustainable sipping, the Stanley Quencher H2.0 has the durability to stand up to a lifetime of use. Eliminate the use of single-use plastic bottles and straws with a travel tumbler built with sustainability in mind.

DISHWASHER SAFE: Spend less time hunched over the sink and more time doing the things you love. Cleaning your tumbler and lid couldn't be easier, just pop them into the dishwasher. Unlike plastic bottles that retain stains & smells, this metallic beauty comes out pristine

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Since 1913 we‚Äôve promised to provide rugged, capable gear for food and drink - accessories built to last a lifetime. It‚Äôs a promise we still keep. Stanley products purchased from Stanley Resellers come with a lifetime warranty. Rest easy knowing we‚Äôve got your back through it all.

title: it keeps liquids hot for a long period of time.
content: I love this cup because it keeps coffee hot.  I also love the easy screw on cap which keeps the item from spilling when you are walking around.  It is important to take the cap off if you are drinking right away as it will burn your mouth.  I have purchased two of these 14 oz quenchers.  Also it is not heavy to carry.

title: Verified Purchase

THIS Stanley kept my ice and tea overnight on the counter just as I left it the night before (a test). There was a bit of watery tea on top, but very minimal. IT DOES NOT SWEAT. And I love this color, too!

title: Not too big or too small

She LOVES this and has actually drank water every single day since it arrived. When she came home from a 2 week international trip the first thing she wanted was her Stanley, filled with ice water. She wasn't a huge water drinker and if this helps her drink more, it is well worth the cost!! Looks good, too. The only thing she dislikes is that it leaks when tipped but it's not advertised as leak free (I don't think anyway). She wants to order something to make it leak free.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have wanted a Stanley for a while but thought it was just more of a trend than anything else so I have hesitated spending the money on it. I finally decided to treat myself and see what all the hype was about. Oh wow, I get it now! This tumbler is amazing! I love it so much! I did a test where I put crushed ice, not cubed, filled it only halfway with ice and then the water. I timed how long the ice lasted and it was almost 40 hours later and the ice was finally gone! I swear this tumbler is the only way I can drink plain water, as it just tastes better in my Stanley. Maybe it‚Äôs a psychological thing but it‚Äôs worth it to me. I haven‚Äôt had issues with leaking, I use the straw through the straw holder part. The handle is perfect for my small hands, and it has the nice smooth grip. It‚Äôs easy to hold and it fits perfectly in my cup holders! I‚Äôm so glad I got this tumbler! Trust me, it‚Äôs worth the price! I also was pleased to see it was delivered wrapped in plastic and paper and arrived in perfect condition. If you‚Äôre on the fence about getting a Stanley tumbler like I was, just get it! It‚Äôs 100% worth it!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024

title: yippee!

My Meoky cup I purchased (Feb 24‚Äô) the handle broke and couldn‚Äôt reattach, tighten or fix. I paid the same price for my Meoky cup as I did My Stanley and I first noticed if My Stanley cup handle breaks I can tighten it up with a screw that‚Äôs placed right below the handle. I have no issues or complaints with My Stanley. It‚Äôs worth the price but some people can‚Äôt afford ^$80-^$100 for a cup but for me catching Stanley‚Äôs on sale and buying one I have no issues this far. I most recently saw an advertising from Stanley cup on Instagram seeking to find scouts to help promote their Stanley cup and I would absolutely love to team up with Amazon and or Stanley to help promote some of thier things. title: Verified Purchase
content: My beautiful new White Frost Stanley! I love it! I tried hard to resist the trend but having kidney stones, it is important for me to drink enough good fresh water. Filling it with two trays of ice and a 40 ounce splash of my zero water from the refridge and I am ready to go for the day.  It spends the night inside the refridge and holds the cold and ice like crazy! It can be a bit heavy for people with wrist issues or arthritis, so if you have those problems, you may want to down size to a 30 or 20 ounce cup. I do wish that Stanley would make more 20 ounce cups with handles. I hand wash my Stanley every couple days and refill changing out my straw topper and silicone base sleeve for a clean set while the freshly washed ones dry. Now I want more colors!

title: Verified Purchase
content: Filled with ice and water and then left it in my car with the straw in it during a couple of hot days.
